text: Which cloud model lets you rent virtual machines, storage, and networks but manage your own OS and apps?
explanation: Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) gives you virtualized compute, storage, and network resources.

text: Which of the following is an example of Software as a Service (SaaS)?
explanation: Microsoft 365 is delivered as a complete SaaS application over the internet.

text: Which are common benefits of using cloud services?
explanation: Cloud offers self-service, consumption-based billing, and scalable resources.

text: A cloud that is used exclusively by a single organization is called a ______ cloud.
explanation: A private cloud is operated solely for one organization.

text: Which cloud deployment model combines on-premises infrastructure with public cloud resources?
explanation: A hybrid cloud integrates on-prem and public cloud environments.
